storyInfo:
Vanilla drags Melantha and Steward with her to take care of her pet, and along the way, they see Blaze with a young Infected girl.
Between them, the Operators decide that after their mission, they would visit to the child who is now receiving treatment and throw a party.

attributes.content: 04:22 P.M. \ Clear
Rhodes Island Landship, Compartment 5, Training Grounds
Hoo! Hah!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Cleave! Thrust! Swing!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Phew... Haah...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That... concludes... *Pant* *pant*... today's training.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.options: Know your limits. You're pushing yourself too hard.;......;Here, have a sports drink.

attributes.content: No, phew.... Don't worry! I'm a-okay, Doctor.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I know myself. And I'm well within my limits here.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Instructor Dobermann and Liskarm helped me work out a training schedule, so you don't have to worry!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: *Pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Huh? What's the matter, Doctor? Why do you look so worried?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Really, I'm fine! It's hard, but I can handle it!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Phew... *pant*... thanks.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Haah.... Okay, I'm good. But this drink, ugh, it really tastes terrible.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Dobermann made it very clear I'm supposed to drink this after exercise, and so has Franka, but it really tastes awful!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: The operators training here always work so hard. I have to go all out. I can't hold anyone back.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, Doctor, I'm going on a mission with the other Blacksteel girls in a couple of days and won't be training here for a while. So thanks so much for everything you've done for me here!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.options: You look like you have something to say.

attributes.content: Hah, perceptive as always, Doctor... Am I so easy to read?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Well, I'm really glad to go on a Blacksteel mission. It's just...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I, uh, I have a few pets, and, uh, I usually take care of them. But when I'm on a mission, I have to ask other people to do it.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I usually ask the other Blacksteel girls.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Liskarm and Franka help most of the time, but they're always on missions together, and taking R&R together.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: If one's gone, so is the other.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Franka likes to joke around, but she's actually really reliable. Puffball, Tiny, Kuro, and Stout all really love Franka!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Sometimes Jessica takes care of them, if I can't find those two. But, um, this one time, Kuro kind of startled her, and I think she was going to cry.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Huh.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Didn't I bring Puffball and the gang around to meet you, Doctor?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Puffball, Tiny, and Kuro are all Originium snails. And Stout is a Sargon Desert Metal Crab, and every last one of them is cute as a button!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hm? What's wrong, Doctor?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh no... I know that look in your eyes, Doctor. No! No! No! No! You can't eat them! Not Puffball, not Tiny, not Kuro, not Stout! You can't eat any of them! I know you've been eating all kinds of weird stuff behind Dr. Kal'tsit's back!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (I was going to ask you to take care of them. But now? Hmph. No way.)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What am I going to do? We're all going out together this time. What's going to happen to my babies?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hmmm.... The other operators are all busy with their own things, so I can't just go up and ask them out of nowhere, can I?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.options: Like, try asking the next one who walks by.

attributes.content: Huh? Take this seriously!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You're joking, right, Doctor?!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Who will it be...? Ooh, I hope it's someone reliable...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Their footsteps... are very light! With a steady pace, very steady. It must be a great warrior!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Huh? What's that fragrance?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I remember this scent, it's...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Melantha!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Ah?!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Y-yes, it's me.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Good afternoon, Doctor, Vanilla.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Erm, so... what can I do for you?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Sorry, it's kind of unusual for you to ask me for something. I just...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Not at all! You're a big help, Melantha! Thank you so much!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's nothing. And actually I'm just going to ask Steward.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: But really, I'm glad I could help.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (She's blushing!)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Haha. Melantha is so timid off the battlefield.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll take great care of Vanilla's pets.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Thank you so much for your trouble!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Thanks, Steward.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Think nothing of it. I really won't have you standing on ceremony. We're friends.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: H- how could we be friends? You two have been with Rhodes Island for so long, you're far more senior than me!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Does company seniority matter so much...?
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, is Melantha also going on this mission?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: None of my superiors mentioned it...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yes, I am.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: It was decided kind of suddenly. They only just told me.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: It was Master, err, Franka, who said she wanted to see how my swordsmanship was coming along. The timing was right, so she applied to have me join the team.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Oh, Franka? She's been teaching you her sword techniques?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Is she actually a good teacher...?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I know she's really reliable, but I hope she isn't a bad influence on a good girl like Melantha.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh no, the more I think about it, the more worried I get!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Not at all! Franka likes to play around, but she's very serious when it comes to sword fighting.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: It's all thanks to Franka that I've come as far as I have. She's a great influence on me!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: ...Sorry, I may have gone a bit overboard.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: You two are actually pretty close.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: But I'm glad to know that Franka is a good teacher anyway. I won't worry.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Franka is a great swordmaster. I've never seen her lose a sparring match to anyone in Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Master is amazing. I have a lot more to learn.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Oh, right. Sorry, but it's time for me to go.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: I have an appointment with Ansel for a routine checkup today.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Routine checkup?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yes. For Oripathy...
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: What, again? Didn't you just get checked the day before yesterday?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: And Medical gave you a new drug after the last checkup, right?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yes. It's because they want to keep tabs on my new medication.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Nothing to worry about. Dr. Warfarin says my infection is under control.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: ...I'm glad.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: You better get going for now.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Thanks again! We could get tea when you're done with your checkup, if you have time?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh, tea...? Erm, yeah! Sounds good!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: It's a date!
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: Thank you again for your help, Steward.
attributes.name: Melantha

attributes.content: And thank you, Vanilla.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Me? Huh?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Nothing. Never mind.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I feel like... Melantha changed a lot. She's in such a good mood now.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You think so too? Melantha is much more confident now than when we first formed the squad.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Confident...? Oh, yes, it's confidence.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I've always felt that Rhodes Islanders are different from the Infected I've met in the past. I think it's because you all... live. You keep pushing so hard to live your lives, if that makes sense?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Sometimes I forget about the whole infection thing altogether.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's really incredible.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hah. Incredible? No, I don't think so.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has been forced to get involved in a lot of things, but it's still essentially a pharmaceutical company. It's always been mostly about developing medicine and the treatments for the Infected.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: An Infected person who would make the effort to come here for treatment, she's going to be the type who won't give up on life, right?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: It makes sense when you put it that way.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That's why we have to work with other organizations to make up for what we don't have.... Such is the case, for example, with Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Thanks to professionals like you, Vanilla, our operators are under less pressure.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: No, I'm not even a professional yet. I'm still in training. It's the senior operators who are professional mercenaries.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Liskarm and the others didn't have to take a test to come here, like I did.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: A test?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yes. Both practical and written exams.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I spent a week in the library preparing for that written test. I didn't even sleep!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: ...Hah hah. You're a hard worker.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: That's a bit of a surprise though. Blacksteel is more serious about our cooperation agreement than I thought.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Why would you say that...? Since the Oripathy Crisis began, a lot of Blacksteel mercenaries got Infected.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: We're okay, though. And Oripathy isn't that scary to us mercenaries. Our work is dangerous enough already.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You'll die in the end either way.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: On the other hand, some clients don't want to hire Infected. So we're getting fewer contracts, making less money, and probably causing some headaches for the bosses.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I think that's around the time we started cooperating with Rhodes Island? Franka told me about it, but I don't know the details.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: And I'm very lucky I got to come here and see so many things and meet so many people I never would've encountered before. Every single day! It's really fulfilling.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Not to mention free dessert in the cafeteria once a week! I've probably gained a lot of weight since coming here...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Probably not. As long as you keep your nutrition balanced, it's good to eat a little more. Take care not to overeat, but health is what matters.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: No, no, no, Steward, you don't understand!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's not about what other people think, it's about how it affects your mood!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: O- oh is that right?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Damn straight. Vanilla knows what she's talking about.
Ah, Blaze...! Oh.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Blaze, who is this little girl...?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: This little rascal? She's Dora, one of my adorable little friends.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And please, try to chill out, Vanilla. I don't want you trying to trade business cards with a child.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Nice to meet you.
attributes.name: Dora..

attributes.content: Uh, hello.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Good afternoon, Miss Dora. Did you take your medicine today?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: (nodding)
attributes.name: Dora

attributes.content: She pulled a half an hour of storybook time out of me on account of it tasted too bitter.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm onto you, little rascal. You said it was too bitter last time too, and Dr. Kal'tsit fixed up the taste!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: B- but it is bad! You said so yourself!
attributes.name: Dora

attributes.content: I don't take the same stuff as you. No excuses.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Aww.
attributes.name: Dora

attributes.content: Um, I need to go...
attributes.name: Dora

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh, it's time for class?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yes. The medic lady said she'd teach us how to make paper flowers today!
attributes.name: Dora

attributes.content: Will you make one for me? I'll give you a candy.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hehehehe, I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Dora

attributes.content: Bye-bye, Mister, Miss!
attributes.name: Dora

attributes.content: No running in the halls! You'll fall and hurt your——
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Oof... she fell.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: This kid....
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Haha, she's got a lot of energy.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yeah, she looks quiet, but she's a wrecking ball. Warfarin has to scare her into behaving... Doesn't matter. Anyway.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I've never seen you two hang out. Aren't you usually with the Blacksteel girls, Vanilla? Did Amiya organize a mixer?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh? This... we're not...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Blaze, don't joke!
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Did that sound like a joke? Honestly, I think we should have a mixer where we all get together and relax.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm sure we'll make time. And anyway, haven't we had a few private functions? I know I've seen Blaze drinking and puking with quite a few contract operators.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Those don't count!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That must be the 'boozy nightmare' Liskarm talks about sometimes...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: By the way, was that little girl a Rhodes Islander?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Dora? She's here for treatment, so I think she counts?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yes. But we're classified differently. Combat personnel are different from logistics personnel, and there's a few others. It's all HR stuff... you know?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You sound unsure...
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: It's not my wheelhouse.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why are you so fixated on Dora?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I don't know. I guess I'm just curious. I saw her when I first got here too...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I came to give the Doctor my paperwork and there was this cute Infected girl and her parents waiting outside the door. .
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: The girl, though still small, was very well-behaved. She just held onto her tattered doll. She didn't make a sound
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It was no big deal. But it made an impression.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That must have been Dora. That doll was a mess. I told her I'd buy her a new one, but she wouldn't have it. I ended up getting Bibeak to stitch it up for her.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So it was her....
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I think I remember she's... Victorian, right?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: I think so. Her medical records say she was involved in a street fight and inhaled a bunch of Originium dust.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I took a look at it before, when I was helping Hibiscus give her some shots.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The children in that ward come from different backgrounds, but they are all in the same place now.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Cardigan likes to play with them, and Ansel always stays late after medicating them to tell stories and such. They're all very happy kids.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Dora is especially optimistic. She always says she wants to join my squad when she grows up. Where do you think she gets it from?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: To want to join Blaze's team, she must be a little unhinged.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's a fairly common story around here. Just pick any of the medical compartments at random and you'll find a few people who've been through similar things.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yeah, it's nothing new. The world sucks.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Is she... very sick?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Her family didn't look rich.... I didn't think they'd be able to afford treatment. Honestly, I kind of didn't expect to see her again.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: A normal place, where the bosses have their heads screwed on right, definitely wouldn't take a dying patient with no money.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: There's a better way to phrase it.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: But Blaze is right. There is no cure for Oripathy. And even an organization like ours has limited resources.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: ...That's why the Infected are in such a tough position.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: But Rhodes Island didn't turn them away!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Rhodes Island isn't small. But I guess you can't say it's a really big organization either.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Since coming to Rhodes Island, I've seen a lot of people. A lot of Infected people who came here for medical attention.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: And some of them even came forward and said they were willing to fight.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: All of us in Op Reserve Team A4 did exactly that.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: You too, Steward?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: I hadn't even heard of this place before the Blacksteel partnership. Who could imagine a company..... a company that saves the Infected and doesn't even get paid anything for it.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That's not quite right.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It- it's not?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's not that we don't get paid anything. We just get paid without money.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If one side has to pay too much, that's actually a big burden on both sides. An arrangement like that wouldn't last. No matter how sweet Amiya might be, she wouldn't do something like that.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We do provide treatment. But it's definitely not free.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Here, we've got a fine example standing right here!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oof, Blaze, you're going to break my shoulder if you keep patting me like that.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: You can choose all kinds of different ways to contribute to Rhodes Island in exchange for the treatment we provide. Definitely not just fighting. Us combat operators are actually the rarest bunch.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We got logistics to handle the paperwork, engineerings to keep Rhodes Island itself trucking along, envoys to go talk to other organizations, not to mention procurement and cleaning staff...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Even if you want to wash dishes in the cafeteria, that's fine. As long as it helps, you can do it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hearing it again, it does sound pretty idealistic.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Is that bad?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Not at all.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: (whistling)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But, but! What can a little kid like Dora do to help Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You saw, they're about to learn how to make origami flowers.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: The paper flowers they fold will be used to decorate the mixer. Then they'll be given to every operator as they come back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Since when is there a mixer?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Just now. I decided.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Whatever. The point is there's work to be done. And the work those little guys do looks a little different from the work I do, but it's all important to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Now let's be real. I know you guys have been calling our company a sweatshop.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That was a joke. Just a joke!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yeah, sure. That's what I say when I tease the Doctor.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze, please!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hmmm.... My opinion is a bit different from that of Blaze.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: There are some of us who trade our labor to Rhodes Island in exchange for treatment, and many more who coincidentally have interests aligned with the company.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Of course, there are many who truly believe in Amiya and her philosophy and are willing to give everything to that end.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: (whistles)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But we don't necessarily all share those ideals. Sometimes, we just happen to be on the same path in the same direction, and end up side by side in this moment.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: I think I understand, but...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's all right. You don't have to think about it too much.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: The important thing is that we're all getting a little bit better. Things are good for now. People are happy.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: As are you, Vanilla. You've been smiling a lot lately.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: O- oh, I have?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's probably just because I'm so fulfilled here at Rhodes Island. Although there's still a lot of things I'm not used to....
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Like doors that suddenly open on their own. And the last time I was in the corridor, some medical device suddenly started talking to me... I jumped out of my skin!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hahaha. I suppose you aren't used to such things.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Adnachiel was telling me about the rubber band launcher he helped Exusiai make. He said you snapped it in half.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: He made that?!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: S- sorry, the rubber band startled me so, I acted on instinct...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I'm really sorry!!!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That's okay, Adnachiel wasn't angry. He's a man of few words, but he's a gentle soul.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: I can testify to that.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: But, um, if he ever comes to you with any more inventions that cause you trouble, do let me know. Or Melantha.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Hey, I just had a thought. Maybe that whole sweatshop thing actually fits?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...What's this again?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: I mean those kids, what are they? Child labor? An early investment?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: An early... investment?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yeah, it'll pay off, won't it? Rhodes Island teaches these kids all kinds of things. The little punks are probably better than us at a bunch of stuff. Like, I get a headache looking at numbers. And then when they toss letters in with the numbers...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: They're all probably going to be awesome. Way more awesome than me. They'll do all kinds of stuff I never could.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So, you know, it's a return on investment.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: A return? Not necessarily——
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Shh, let me dream. Don't say it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh, it's Amiya.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Looks like another mission. I kinda wanna blow it off. I can just blow it off, right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, I gotta go. Vanilla, Steward, let's get a drink at that mixer!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She talks like that, but she still walks away with a smile on her face....
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Are we really going to have a mixer? Wh- what if I don't drink?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh, don't mind Blaze. She's always like that. She won't force you.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: No? That's kind of a disappointment...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Okay, this is my place.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Come on in.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: All right.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Ah... so this is where Vanilla lives.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Don't laugh. It's kind of a mess.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh, here's Puffball and the gang.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Puffball? What a cute n...
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: ...name.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Vanilla, your pets, they're... are these... these are your pets?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: They're all cute little critters from my hometown!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hmmm....
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: (I fear the word 'cute' has lost all meaning...)
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry, Steward. Kuro may be big, but he's really the gentlest of them all!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: *Sigh*.... It's so hard to fight them on the battlefield. And Instructor Dobermann always yells at me, but I really can't help it!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I- I can tell you really like animals, Vanilla.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: And... Well, these pets, they... they certainly have character.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Hehe. They sure do!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: They're very well behaved. They don't make a mess. Just give them a little food and water every day and they're good to go!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh, but be careful not to press the spikes on their shells. Otherwise.....
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Otherwise?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: They explode.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Explode...?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Vanilla, is it really okay to have a pet like this in your room....?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Huh? Of course! I got permission from Amiya and Dr. Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: This terrarium is made of a special material that insulates the Originium. It's very safe!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Also, I prepared their food already.... See, just press the button on the side, like so, and it automatically feeds them.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hehe. Pretty crazy, huh?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I actually think it's crazier that you're here keeping Originium slugs...
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Sorry, what?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Oh, and for water, they really only need a little bit every other day. Keep the environment nice and dry, just like my hometown.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Understood, I'll make sure not to overwater them.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: These Originium snails, and that metal crab, they look nicer than any I've seen before.... Your hometown is in Sargon, correct?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: That's right. It's a very remote place in the Sargon countryside.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What's it like?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: It's a.... Well, a very poor place with very few resources.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You can't farm there, because there's nothing but sand. You have to hunt to survive. All the children in my tribe are raised to be great hunters.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You too?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yes, me too.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Then why did you join Blacksteel...?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: It's kind of embarrassing, but... for money.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Money?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Yup. Blacksteel, Blacksteel Worldwide, is just a mercenary group.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Maybe everyone joins with a different goal, but a lot of mercenaries just need money.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: And that's me.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Is that right? But it seems as though Jessica doesn't want for money?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Jessica...? She has some other motivation, I guess. She doesn't talk about these things much, so I don't really know.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: But where I come from, everyone is very poor...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It doesn't rain much in the Sargon deserts. When it does, the water accumulates in small oasis pools, and caravans cross the entire desert looking for them, stopping briefly as they pass by our tribe to take out some goods to trade.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's mostly barter. No one has much money. But every home has a little something to trade.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: The caravans usually stays for just a day or two. And when it gets very cold at night, so everyone gathers around the fire.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: We eat a little jerky. The adults drink a couple of sips of wine to ward off the cold, and the kids get a handful of dates to snack on.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: The traders tell the children about what's going on in the world outside the desert, usually something new and fun.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Like how in the far, far east, there are fragrant cities with flowers everywhere, huge metropolises overflowing with wealth and happiness...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I could go for some of that.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Right? But since I've been out here, I haven't had a chance to check and see if the east is really so great.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Anyway, having heard stories like that, it's only natural I'd be curious about the outside world. There's no way I could stay in the desert and be a regular old hunter.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: So I followed the merchants out to a small town on the edge of the desert.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: And you found out things weren't as good as you thought?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: They're not so good, but also not so bad... At least the food is better than back home.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I didn't have much money on me. Everything my family had still wasn't enough. Even a hostel was too expensive to stay in.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's not like I had a lot of options besides mercenary work. But I don't regret it.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: ...Anyway, that's enough of that.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Where's your hometown, Steward?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I'm from Kjerag.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Wow! I heard it snows there all year round. Is that true? I've never seen snow...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Haha. And you never will, at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Really! Well, I'll have to save up. Jessica says those new body insulation suits are really expensive!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: ...Haha, that might be a bit overkill...
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Melantha was so happy you asked her to help.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Though she may not show it, which is both a strength and a weakness of hers.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Really...? I hope I'm not being a bother.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Certainly not. It's no bother to Melantha, or myself, for that matter.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Now, off on your mission, Vanilla. And rest assured I will take excellent care of Puffball and the others.
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Oh, just a minute, Steward!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hm? Was there something else?
attributes.name: Steward

attributes.content: Not that I totally understand everything you and Blaze were talking about, but...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Next time Op Reserve Team A4 visits the kids in the treatment wards, please bring me along!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Let's learn how to make paper flowers, so we're ready for that mixer.
attributes.name: Vanilla
